title: Fragment, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen, mirrored glass
Technique: ladder, buttonhole, surface, stem and satin stitch embroidery on plain weave
description: Red silk ground fabric pieced with red, yellow and blue cotton and embroidered with a design of stylized flowers and narrow borders.
